page.title: 05The River
page.content: The River Humber takes up a great part of our area.The river is very fast flowing and dangerous.One of our children was nearly swept away recently while playing on the bank side.At the side of the bank is a measure which tells you when the river is going to flood.It measures from three meters to twelve meters. The river sometimes floods our area and fills the cellars of the houses and floods the land.Recently the Yorkshire Water Authority have been building a tidal wall to try and prevent the floods. The River has lots of shifting sand banks and often tugs have to go out to help boats which get stuck in the mud. In recent years there have been more fishermen coming to Paull and they have caused a pollution problem with their lead weights and lines.
